run_updated.note: string - Optional note for the state transition

run.based_on_local_workspace: boolean - Whether the run is based on local workspace
run.branch: string - Git branch for the run

changes.phase: string - Phase of the change (plan or apply)
changes.moved: boolean - Whether the entity was moved

run.command: string - Command executed for the run

commit.author: string - Commit author
commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

creator_session.account_name: string - Account name for machine sessions
creator_session.admin: boolean - Whether the session has admin privileges
creator_session.creator_ip: string - IP address where the session was created
creator_session.machine: boolean - Whether this is a machine session
creator_session.member: boolean - Whether the user is a member of the account
creator_session.name: string - Display name of the user
creator_session.stack_id: string - Stack ID for machine sessions

run.drift_detection: boolean - Whether this is a drift detection run

runtime_config.runner_image: string - Docker image used for the run

run.triggered_by: string - Who or what triggered the run

stack.administrative: boolean - Whether the stack is administrative
stack.branch: string - Git branch tracked by this stack
stack.name: string - Stack display name

run_updated.username: string - User who triggered the state change
